title: Tenta Brella CRE-M
paragraphs: The Tenta Brella CRE-M is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is a Barazushi-branded variant of the the Tenta Brella from the Splatlands Collection and features a different sub and special weapon.
The Tenta Brella CRE-M makes its first appearance in Splatoon 3 with identical stats to the Tenta Brella.
- Promotional image of the Splatlands Collection - Barazushi weapons
- Promotional image of the Barazushi collection

The suffix "CRE-M" is a stylized spelling of the word cream.
